name: The last lover
description:
Story introduction

Damon, the hero, is involved in a huge illegal organ trading organization when investigating a murder case. In order to expose the organization's crime, Damon has gone through a series of soul stirring investigations and battles.

Game features

The game contains elements such as terror, shooting and sneaking. Players need to fight against multiple enemies and complete evidence collection of criminal groups.

Game plot

Although this is an independent game category, it still adds plot animation to enrich the story.

Game Map

Park: players will experience the terror elements of the game in the park chapter.
Central hospital: players will experience the sneaking elements of the game in the hospital chapter.
Underpass: players will experience the shooting elements of the game in the underpass chapter.

Prop system

All items in this game have specific functions and attributes. Players need to use them correctly to defeat enemies.
